name: Tottoko Hamtaro Nazo Nazo Q: Kumonoue no? Shiro
summary: The game is a quiz game featuring 450 riddles by Nintendo website visitors. It stars Princess Hatena (princess question) who is about to be queen but is stopped by the Dark Hams and kidnapped by the Riddle Q team

videos.name: Gameplay Video
